
{{alias}}( file[, options] )
    Synchronously reads a file as WebAssembly.

    Parameters
    ----------
    file: string|Buffer|integer
        Filename or file descriptor.

    options: Object (optional)
        Options.

    options.flag: string (optional)
        Flag. Default: 'r'.

    Returns
    -------
    out: Error|Uint8Array
        File contents.

    Examples
    --------
    > var out = {{alias}}( './beep/boop.wasm' )

    See Also
    --------
